item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, April 26, 2025 at 8:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Watching o3 guess a photo's location is surreal, dystopian and entertaining (475 points | 246 comments)
2. Economists don't know what's going on (53 points | 44 comments)
3. Show HN: My self-written hobby OS is finally running on my vintage IBM ThinkPad (236 points | 48 comments)
4. Bill Gates's Personal Easter Eggs in 8 Bit BASIC (2008) (6 points | 1 comment)
5. An end to all this prostate trouble? (413 points | 179 comments)
6. California's $20 fast-food minimum wage improves pay at small cost to consumers (21 points | 5 comments)
7. The Seven-Year Rule (22 points | 14 comments)
8. Barlow's Principles of Adult Behaviour (50 points | 25 comments)
9. Stuffed-Na(a)N: stuff your NaNs (74 points | 37 comments)
10. Cloth (379 points | 45 comments)
11. LLMs can see and hear without any training (129 points | 46 comments)
12. I wrote a book called "Crap Towns". It seemed funny at the time (351 points | 255 comments)
13. Robot Dexterity Still Seems Hard (16 points | 11 comments)
14. Australian who ordered radioactive materials walks away from court (195 points | 208 comments)
15. Thank you for holding my duck (2021) (48 points | 15 comments)
16. Berkeley Humanoid Lite – Open-source robot (242 points | 29 comments)
17. Freshpaint (YC S19) is hiring back end and front end engineers (Remote, US only) ( | hide)
18. Mobygratis – Free Moby music to empower your creative projects (133 points | 28 comments)
19. Fifteen new giant radio galaxies discovered with ASKAP (28 points | 1 comment)
20. Lossless LLM compression for efficient GPU inference via dynamic-length float (388 points | 109 comments)
21. Wikipedia’s nonprofit status questioned by D.C. U.S. attorney (799 points | 726 comments)
22. World Emulation via Neural Network (231 points | 40 comments)
23. Parallel ./configure (188 points | 142 comments)
24. The Friendship Recession: The Lost Art of Connecting (274 points | 210 comments)
25. Women rely partly on smell when choosing friends (23 points | 7 comments)
26. The record-breaking tunnel being built from Denmark to Germany (3 points | discuss)
27. Your phone isn't secretly listening to you, but the truth is more disturbing (175 points | 128 comments)
28. Show HN: Formalizing Principia Mathematica using Lean (174 points | 32 comments)
29. Reproducibility project fails to validate dozens of biomedical studies (253 points | 117 comments)
30. CONL: "Markdown" for your config files (4 points | 1 comment)
